title: BTC spikes above $35K, Bankman-Fried takes the stand, Gemini sues Genesis, Elon Musk’s plans | Weekly Recap
description: This week saw Bitcoin (BTC) hit a new yearly high; Sam Bankman-Fried testifies; Gemini sues Genesis Global, Elon Musk has crypto plans and regulatory efforts resurface.

title: Ripple and XRP’s Ambitious Ascent: Targeting JPM Coin’s $1 Billion Intraday Repo Market
description: XRP community eyes taking a share of the $1 billion daily settlement JPM Coin boasts of. Its core features including decentralization, speed, and low cost are catalysts for this ambitious goal. Top XRP community member WrathofKahneman (WoK) is enthusiastic about the possibility of XRP capturing a slice of the $1 billion-a-day repo market that JPM [...]
